text: Luis Landa Escober (December 28, 1875 - 1977) was a Honduran academic, scientist and lawyer. Escober was known for his papers on nature, botany, chemistry and the natural sciences. A member of the Society of Geography and History of Honduras, he was given several awards for his work in Honduras, including the Order of José Cecilio del Valle. ==References== Category:Honduran scientists Category:Honduran botanists Category:Honduran academics Category:Honduran lawyers Category:Honduran centenarians Category:1875 births Category:1977 deaths
title: Luis Landa Escober
